00043 int main(int argc, char* argv[])
00044 {
00045         if(argc > 1)
00046         {
00047                 if(strcmp(argv[1],"-i")==0)
00048                 {
00049                         if(argc != 4)
00050                         {
00051                                 cout << "Usage: generic_server -i <GENERIC_SERVER_NAME> <GENERIC_SERVER_CONF_FILE>" << endl;
00052                                 return(1);      
00053                         }
00054                         if(InstallService(argv[2],argv[3]))
00055                                 cout << "Service Installed Successfully: " << argv[2] << endl;
00056                         else
00057                                 cout << "Error Installing Service: " << argv[2] << endl;
00058                         return(1);      
00059                 }
00060                 else
00061                 if(strcmp(argv[1],"-d")==0)
00062                 {
00063                         if(argc != 3)
00064                         {
00065                                 cout << "Usage: generic_server -d <GENERIC_SERVER_NAME>" << endl;
00066                                 return(1);      
00067                         }
00068                         if(DeleteService(argv[2]))
00069                                 cout << "Service UnInstalled Successfully: " << argv[2] << endl;
00070                         else
00071                                 cout << "Error UnInstalling Service: " << argv[2] << endl;
00072                         return(1);      
00073                 }
00074         }
00075         SERVICE_TABLE_ENTRY DispatchTable[] = {{argv[1],ServiceMain},{NULL,NULL}};
00076         if((StartServiceCtrlDispatcher(DispatchTable)) == 0)
00077                 cout << "Error starting service: " << GetLastError() << endl;
00078         return 0;

00082 void WINAPI ServiceMain(DWORD argc, LPTSTR *argv)
00083 {
00084         m_ServiceStatus.dwServiceType = SERVICE_WIN32;
00085         m_ServiceStatus.dwCurrentState = SERVICE_START_PENDING;
00086         m_ServiceStatus.dwControlsAccepted = SERVICE_ACCEPT_STOP|SERVICE_ACCEPT_PAUSE_CONTINUE;
00087         m_ServiceStatus.dwWin32ExitCode = 0;
00088         m_ServiceStatus.dwServiceSpecificExitCode = 0;
00089         m_ServiceStatus.dwCheckPoint = 0;
00090         m_ServiceStatus.dwWaitHint = 0;
00091 
00092         m_ServiceStatusHandle = RegisterServiceCtrlHandler(argv[0], 
00093                                             ServiceCtrlHandler); 
00094         if (m_ServiceStatusHandle == (SERVICE_STATUS_HANDLE)0)
00095                 return;
00096         if(argc == 0)
00097         {
00098                 m_ServiceStatus.dwCurrentState = SERVICE_STOPPED;
00099                 SetServiceStatus(m_ServiceStatusHandle, &m_ServiceStatus);
00100                 return;
00101         }
00102         m_ServiceStatus.dwCurrentState = SERVICE_RUNNING;
00103         m_ServiceStatus.dwCheckPoint = 0;
00104         m_ServiceStatus.dwWaitHint = 0;
00105         SetServiceStatus(m_ServiceStatusHandle, &m_ServiceStatus);
00106         bRunning=true;
00107         while(bRunning)
00108                 start_service(argv);
00109         return;
00110 }

00113 void WINAPI ServiceCtrlHandler(DWORD Opcode)
00114 {
00115   generic_server *fwork = generic_server::instance();
00116   ostringstream os;
00117   
00118   switch(Opcode)
00119   {
00120     case SERVICE_CONTROL_PAUSE: 
00121       m_ServiceStatus.dwCurrentState = SERVICE_PAUSED;
00122           SetServiceStatus(m_ServiceStatusHandle,&m_ServiceStatus);
00123       break;
00124     
00125         case SERVICE_CONTROL_CONTINUE:
00126       m_ServiceStatus.dwCurrentState = SERVICE_RUNNING;
00127           notify_server();      
00128           SetServiceStatus(m_ServiceStatusHandle,&m_ServiceStatus);
00129       break;
00130     
00131         case SERVICE_CONTROL_STOP:
00132       os << fwork->get_cur_time() << " Thr.ID: SERVICE STOP signal received. Shutting down.. ";
00133       fwork->log(LOG_LOW,LOG_LOW,(char *) os.str().c_str());
00134       m_ServiceStatus.dwWin32ExitCode = 0;
00135       m_ServiceStatus.dwCurrentState = SERVICE_STOPPED;
00136       m_ServiceStatus.dwCheckPoint = 0;
00137       m_ServiceStatus.dwWaitHint = 0;
00138 
00139       SetServiceStatus(m_ServiceStatusHandle,&m_ServiceStatus);
00140       bRunning=false;
00141       break;
00142     
00143         case SERVICE_CONTROL_INTERROGATE:
00144           GenerateConsoleCtrlEvent(CTRL_BREAK_EVENT,0);         
00145 
00146       break; 
00147   }
00148   return;
00149 }

00152 BOOL notify_server()
00153 {
00154         SOCKET sock;
00155         int status;
00156         ostringstream os;
00157         struct sockaddr_in sockaddr;
00158         generic_server *fwork = generic_server::instance();
00159 
00160         sock = socket(AF_INET, SOCK_STREAM, IPPROTO_TCP);
00161     sockaddr.sin_family = AF_INET;                               /* Internet/IP */
00162     sockaddr.sin_addr.s_addr = inet_addr((const char *)"127.0.0.1");
00163     sockaddr.sin_port = (u_short)(u_short)htons(fwork->get_command_port());
00164     if ( (status = connect(sock, (struct sockaddr *)&sockaddr, sizeof(sockaddr))) < 0)
00165     {
00166         os << fwork->get_cur_time() << " Thr.ID: SERVICE 07 cannot connect to COMMAND_PORT: " << fwork->get_command_port() << " " << status;
00167         fwork->log(LOG_LOW,LOG_LOW,(char *) os.str().c_str());
00168         return(0);
00169     }
00170         shutdown(sock,2);
00171 #ifdef WINDOWS
00172         closesocket(sock);
00173 #else
00174         close(sock);
00175 #endif
00176         return(0);
00177 }

00180 BOOL InstallService(char *service_name,char *conf_file)
00181 {
00182   char strDir[1024],strExe[1024];
00183   SC_HANDLE schSCManager,schService;
00184  
00185   memset(strExe,0,1024);
00186   GetCurrentDirectory(1024,strDir);
00187   strcat(strExe,strDir);
00188   strcat(strExe,"\\GENERIC_SERVER.exe ");
00189   strcat(strExe,strDir);
00190   strcat(strExe,"\\");
00191   strcat(strExe,conf_file);
00192   schSCManager = OpenSCManager(NULL,NULL,SC_MANAGER_ALL_ACCESS);
00193 
00194   if (schSCManager == NULL) 
00195     return false;
00196   LPCTSTR lpszBinaryPathName=strExe;
00197 
00198   schService = CreateService(schSCManager,service_name, 
00199         service_name, // GENERIC_SERVER name to display
00200      SERVICE_ALL_ACCESS, // desired access 
00201      SERVICE_WIN32_OWN_PROCESS, // GENERIC_SERVER type 
00202      SERVICE_AUTO_START, // start type 
00203      SERVICE_ERROR_NORMAL, // error control type 
00204      lpszBinaryPathName, // GENERIC_SERVER's binary 
00205      NULL, // no load ordering group 
00206      NULL, // no tag identifier 
00207      NULL, // no dependencies
00208      NULL, // LocalSystem account
00209      NULL); // no password
00210   if (schService == NULL)
00211     return false; 
00212 
00213   CloseServiceHandle(schService);
00214   return true;
00215 }

00218 BOOL DeleteService(char *service_name)
00219 {
00220         SC_HANDLE schSCManager;
00221         SC_HANDLE schService;
00222         schSCManager = OpenSCManager(NULL,NULL,SC_MANAGER_ALL_ACCESS);
00223 
00224         if (schSCManager == NULL)
00225                 return false;
00226         schService=OpenService(schSCManager,service_name,SERVICE_ALL_ACCESS);
00227         if (schService == NULL)
00228                 return false;
00229         if(DeleteService(schService)==0)
00230                 return false;
00231         if(CloseServiceHandle(schService)==0)
00232                 return false;
00233 return true;
00234 }
